description: {"blocks":[{"key":"a0o8v","text":"This protocol described the production of human cortical neurons from induced pluripotent stem cells. The differentiation protocol of cortical neurons is adapted and modified from Shi, Y. et al., 2012 (pharmacologically directed) and Zhang, Y. et al., 2013 (transcription factor directed), as previously described by Hedegaard et.al., 2020. These neurons exhibited molecular and functional hallmarks of cortical neurons.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":180,"length":20},{"key":1,"offset":234,"length":22},{"key":2,"offset":317,"length":22}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6B869CD0ADEA11EDA935D96427617CB0","url":"https://www.nature.com/articles/nprot.2012.116"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"7E653D70ADEA11EDA935D96427617CB0","url":"https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3751803/"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A71EE530AC7E11ED9AB28D22D5A4C6A5","url":"https://europepmc.org/article/med/32502466"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"atj9c","text":"Add 10% medium volume of pre-warmed Dispase (10 mg/mL, sterilized, in PBS) directly into the well that still has medium in it. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5prr","text":"Incubate at 37°C for 10 min at least.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ac7p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4o0bh","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ar6v5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5tp23","text":"Some wells take longer (up to 30 min) for Dispase to lift the cell sheet. ","type":"align-justify"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8ttpg","text":"","type":"align-justify"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"f0np7","text":"P3 rat astrocyte can continue to expand and hence, astrocyte plating density can be adjusted slightly depending on how early/late astrocyte plating is relative to that of cortical neurons.","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

Astrocytes are split into 6 x uncoated T75 flasks. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"13ji","text":"16.2.2 Adherent astrocytes are washed with PBS once.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4pvlj","text":"16.2.3. Add 10mL of Accutase per T75 flask and incubate the dish at 37°C for approximately 10-20 mins. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"atloj","text":"16.2.4. Check regularly for cell lifting.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1u3lh","text":"16.2.5. Carefully transfer all of the dish content into a pre-warmed falcon.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3qaqd","text":"16.2.6.
